subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although there was no formal announcement, Ken Rosenthal reported that 2016 would be Ortiz’s last season. His status in the game might leave him no choice but to have a farewell tour.
snippet: Although there was no formal announcement, Ken Rosenthal reported that 2016 would be Ortiz’s last season. His status in the game might leave him no choice but to have a farewell tour.
